item.description:
Global Trade Summit 2011: Expanding Exports & Building International Partnerships

When:              Tuesday, April 5, from 11:00 a.m. – 6:15 p.m.

Where:             Brandeis University

                        415 South Street, Waltham, MA 02453

Register:          www.brandeis.edu/global/tradesummit

This one-day conference is a premier Massachusetts event for business people and other professionals seeking to understand and succeed in global markets. It is being organized in partnership with some of the Commonwealth's key government agencies focused on international business and with leading Massachusetts business associations. It will feature more than 30 experts discussing international trade, the state of particular markets, and successful international business strategies. The eight conference sessions will include “export financing 101,” “building and managing global trade operations,” and ones focused on South America and Korea and the ASEAN region. Massachusetts Life Sciences Center President & CEO Dr. Susan Windham-Bannister will chair a session on “Doing Business with Europe: Opportunities in Germany and the United Kingdom.” A lunch, reception, and other activities will allow for networking and informal conversation. Reduced early registration rates are available through March 21st. For additional information, call (781) 736-2178 or email tradesummit@brandeis.edu.
item.name: Expanding Exports & Building International Partnerships
